TitleEnglish: Gals Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
SummaryEnglish: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he gets involved with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
Aliases: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa inai!?
